divs: sighting detailsbeautiful day working in my yard..finished raking and took a rest on my swing. i looked to the near north east....more east than north. there was an object just hoovering in the sky. it stayed stationary then i realized i saw some kind of energy field around it. you could see the swirling ( like an asphalt street on a hot summer day)so i could tell it was moving in place. no i did not see it spin but the energy field was swirling. the clouds were very whispy that day i think they were cirrus. after about 5 minutes of viewing 3 jets not military that i knew, not commercial liners, but flew within 2 minutes of each other and the object disappeared. what was so strange is the clouds or just like a contrail can make strange shapes the cirrus clouds had formed into 2 circles as they drifted away from the area in the sky where the object had been. if i was to guess it was about 2000 feet in the air. just below the low clouds that day. location i would have to say around s.r.32 towards noblesville. now i drove down there to see if there was anything interesting and it was around duke energy. and this wasnt the first time weird things happened in about the same spot in the sky. just last week i saw 3 black helicopters fly in formation about the same area flying southeast. and a couple of months ago i saw somethg odd in the sky just hoovering a bit east of same area in the sky of 3\19\10 .....then 3 black helicopters flew in and the objects disappeared. i did not see them disappear. once i was distracted by the helicopters and looked back to view the objects they were gone. there were 2 that time. did not see as much detail with the earlier sighting as i did on 3\19\2010. my feelings..well,,as i do believe in things greater than ourselves i also realize most odd sightings can be explained. this was a ufo to me becasue it wasn't a marketing business balloon too high. it was exhibiting some form of energy field. and it was hoovering.at that same distance i can tell what commercial liner it is by the colors. this had no markings from my vantage point. it looked metalic with no outward wings,or propellers. but what was weird to me, i had forgotten about the other sighting from a couple of months ago until this one refreshed my memory.
Summary: Pulsing straw hat from 1920's abt 2000ft in sky.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Westfield
There were no other sightings in Westfield on or around March 19th 2010
